articles.title: Argentina in World Cup Final Gives Tired Nation a Reason to Celebrate
articles.description: Hit hard by economic stagnation and inflation, Argentines put hardship aside to watch Lionel Messi and their team take on France

articles.title: Despite virus, entire France squad trains on eve of FIFA World Cup final against Argentina
articles.description: France coach Didier Deschamps said earlier Saturday the team were taking action to stop the spread of illness, which has affected a number of players.
articles.content:
The whole France squad attended a training session on the eve of Sunday’s World Cup final against Argentina after a virus sidelined a number of players this week.
Coach Didier Deschamps said earlier Saturday the team were taking action to stop the sp... [2376 chars]
